price: 14. « Lis ton Livre. Il suffira de toi seul aujourd’hui pour te demander des comptes à toi-même », lui sera-t-il dit.
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
